title: Why am I banned?
body: Hello riot... You guys banned me for 14 days? For what? someone told me to kys. All i ever said was " Man i haven't played ryze in so long" and i get a Kys ok riot I've been playing your game for 5 years since s2 and this is what i get? sigh i'm very disappointed in you guys. My cousin works at riot name Kimberly Xiong i got to fucking tour around there I thought it was fucking awesome over there and when i get older when i hit 18 i would like to fucking join League U but you know how am I supposed to get better if i'm fucking banned. I hit gold i haven't flamed anyone since. I say kys one time at mid to half way cause enemy team teemo is 4-16 he's basically inting for the other team? and the other team is trying their damn hearts out to carry this mother fucker? And you ban me? what the fuck? He tells me to kys beginning of the game and this is what happens if you tell them to kys aight riot. How am i supposed to get the victorious skin for graves if i wont get any rewards???? thanks riot im fucking disappointed at you guys. I thought very highly of you guys, I said every time an enemy said riot games fucking sucks dick. i would always stick up for y'all i would say hey they are trying their best to balance every champ. or hey your playing the game right? that must mean it doesn't suck? and y'all fucking ban me im so disappointed. i got Honor 5 about 2 months ago i fucking begged for honors cause I wanted that honor capsule and i got that shit and i got dunk master Darius. and y'all banned my damn account. hell this fucking week i got another honor capsule for being a nice person and you fucking banned me????? wtf? y'all have some fucking mixed fucking feelings riot im fucking disappointed in you guys im fucking pissed that i was banned instead of the fucking teemo im fucking pissed i didn't get to make a fucking video for my friend about that ryze or Darius game i was gonna fucking record and download im fucking disappointed in you riot. You guys also unbanned gross gore? and you guys are about to unbann T1 aight riot thanks for unbanning them and not me...

replies.body: Post your chat logs. No one can help you without those.
RIP season rewards. You post itself pretty much sums up the type of player you are.

> [{quoted}](name=KickingKangaroo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=dunklj6b,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-08T04:40:58.080+0000)
>
> I hit gold i haven&#039;t flamed anyone since. I say kys one time at mid to half way cause enemy team teemo is 4-16 he&#039;s basically inting for the other team? And you ban me? what the fuck? He tells me to kys beginning of the game and this is what happens if you tell them to kys aight riot

So it seems you were flaming before.  Are you sure you haven't received a restriction before?  Anyway, promoting self harm is a terrible thing to do regardless of whether or not you were triggered.  When you respond to toxicity, you do it at your own risk.

You should never respond to toxicity (aka: don't feed the troll), that's riot's policy.  Mute, play the game through, and move on.

From the looks of OP's post. Hes just toxic, im not surprised he got banned judging from it he cant use other words than "fucking" 7 times in a sentence and 3 of them in a 7 word span.

"y'all have some fucking mixed fucking feelings riot im fucking disappointed in you guys im fucking pissed that i was banned instead of the fucking teemo im fucking pissed i didn't get to make a fucking video for my friend about that ryze or Darius game i was gonna fucking record and download im fucking disappointed in you riot."
If I were you and someone was harassing ne and then i outplayed them I would just give them a nice thumbs up emote.
